summary: The Project Turnkey Act (HR 1042) proposes amending the HOME Investment Partnerships Act to establish a Project Turnkey Program. This program will provide funds to eligible entities to acquire, rehabilitate, and operate vacant hotels and motels for affordable housing and shelter. Funds can also be used for rental assistance, supportive services, and other related activities. The bill authorizes $1 billion annually for the program, with stipulations on fund allocation, administration, and eligible activities and entities.
